verses.2: “Thei in; Judah minam Hurʼ tapa ahi Uriʼ tapa Bezalel a minin ka sam khin hi.
verses.3: Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuh ah nasep nading; bulh ding suangte seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi.
verses.6: En in, amah tawh, Dan minam, Ahisamakʼ tapa Oholiab ka seh khinzo hi. Amaute in nang kong thupiak khempeuh a bawl theih nadingun a hih thei mi khempeuh tungah siamna ka pia khinzo hi.
verses.7: Amauʼ sep dingte hih bang ahi hi: Kikhopna buk le thuciamna singkuang le a tunga om hehpihna tokhom le buk sung na khempeuh,
verses.8: sabuai le a nazatte le a siangtho meivak khuam le a nazatte khempeuh, paknamtui biakna tau,
verses.9: le meihal biakna tau a nazatte khempeuh tawh, kuang le a ngakna,
verses.10: le amauʼ siampi nasep nadingin siampi Aaronʼ puan siangthote le ama tapateʼ puante ahi, hoihtakin a kigan puante,
verses.11: le siangtho mun adingin nilh sathau le a namtui paknamtui ahi hi. Ka thupiakte khempeuh tawh kituakin nangmah in na bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.13: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Keima Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih pen Topa ahi keimah in note a hong siangthosak ka hihna na theih nadingun na khang tawntungun keimah le noteʼ kikalah lim khat hi ding hi.
verses.14: Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin a siangtho ahi hi. Tua ni-in a tawlnga lo mi peuhmah kithat dinga, tua ni-in na a sem mi peuhmah ama miteʼ kiang panin kikhen khia ding hi.
verses.15: Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding hi. Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi a tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi a, Topaʼ tungah siangtho hi. Sabbath ni-in nasep khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih ciangin a tawntung thuciamna-in amauʼ khang tawntungin Sabbath tangin, Israel mite in Sabbath kem ding uh hi.
verses.17: Ni guk sungteng Topa in vanlelei bawlin, a ni sagih ni-in amah tawlnga a, a tha dimsakkik hi. Keimah le Israel miteʼ kikalah hih Sabbath ni pen lim khat hi tawntung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
verses.18: Sinai Mual tungah thugenna a man khit ciangin Pasianʼ khut tawh a kigelh suangpek ahi thuciamna suangpek nihte, amah in Moses a pia hi.
